extends Shape

      Methods

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sphere

        public Sphere()
        Creates a new instance of a Sphere with all values set to 0.

      • Sphere

        public Sphere(double xCoord,
      double yCoord,
      double zCoord,
      double r,
      double zoom,
      double m,
      double x2,
      double y2,
      double z2,
      java.awt.Color c)
        Creates a new instance of a Sphere with the fields initialized to the parameters.
        Parameters:
        xCoord - X-Coordinate of the center of the Sphere.
        yCoord - Y-Coordinate of the center of the Sphere.
        zCoord - Y-Coordinate of the center of the Sphere.
        r - Radius of the Sphere.
        zoom - Distance from the origin to the 45 degree mark on the x-axis.
        m - Mass of the Sphere.
        x2 - X-Coordinate of where the light hits the Sphere.
        y2 - Y-Coordinate of where the light hits the Sphere.
        z2 - Z-Coordinate of where the light hits the Sphere.
        Precondition:
        radius > 0, z != 0, zoom != 0

      • draw

        public void draw(gpdraw.DrawingTool marker)
        Draws the Sphere onto a SketchPad, with a light providing as the optical illusion to make it appear 3D.
        Overrides:
        draw in class Shape
        Parameters:
        marker - a DrawingTool initialized with a SketchPad.
        Postcondition:
        Draws the Sphere. Moves the marker to the location where the center of light is, sets the color to white.
